bibl.title: Special Order No. 77 from James McGunnegle, November 30, 1918

div1.p: Moran is ordered to Bordeaux, France.

div1.head: Special Order No. 77 from James McGunnegle, November 30, 1918
div1.opener:
HQ. Q. M. CASUAL DEPOT
CAMP CLAYTON
A.P.O.910
FRANCE
November 30, 1918.
CONFIDENTIAL
SPECIAL ORDER)
No. 77)
Par. #6)
div1.p:
The following named officers are re-
lieved from further duty at this station,
and will proceed from Chateau-du-Loir
(Sarthe) to Bordeaux (Gironde), reporting
upon arrival to the Commanding General, for
temporary duty in the Office of the Dis-
bursing Quartermaster:

The travel directed is necessary in
the military service.
div1.closer:
BY ORDER OF LT. COL. TOLLEY JAMES McGUNNEGLE
Captain, Q.M.C.
Adjutant. HEADQUARTERS
Q.M. CASUAL DEPOT
A.P.O.
J.
OFFICIAL
010
ASSISTANT PROVOST MARSHAL
star* A. E. F. -N0 317 star*
DEC. 1918
ASSISTANT PROVOST MARSHAL
star* A. E. F. -N0 244 star*
910
1 2P - 18
ex jR3
Jank Kly
